name: Test Browser Interaction Features
description:
Test browser interaction features like screernshots, wait
    maximizing, etc.

steps.name: I click the "Follow Twitter & Facebook" button

result.error_message:
error encountered searching page for text: failed to select elements from selection 'XPath: //*[text()[contains(., "@seleniumeasy")]]': unexpected response: {"sessionId":"ab9f3088b5b9cf7267018739a7b18765","status":13,"value":{"message":"unknown error: cannot determine loading status

steps.name: I should see the "Log in and follow @seleniumeasy" button
I key "Hello, World." in the active element

name: Filling and Valdiating File Fields
description:
Test steps that interact with file fields. This step must be
    ran with the "test2" environment.

name: Verify Characteristics and Values of a Form
description:
Verify various characteristics (e.g. disabled fields) and
    values of a form.

elements.name: Verify Disabled Fields
elements.description: Verify that fields are disabled as expected.

steps.name: the first instance of "Generate File" should be disabled

elements.name: Verify Enabled Fields
elements.description: Verify that fields are enabled as expected.

steps.name: the first instance of "Generate File" should be enabled

elements.name: Verify Selecting Today's Date
elements.description: Verify a date field contain's todays date after selecting from a date picker.

elements.name: Verify Entering Today's Date
elements.description: Verify a date field contain's todays date after entering it.

elements.name: Verify Textbox Value
elements.description: Verify a textbox contains a certain value.

elements.name: Test Send Key
elements.description: Verify a new line can be sent using "I send key" step.

steps.name: I key "Hello, World" in the "comment" field

name: Verify Results of Navigation Actions
description:
After clicking a link, clicking a button, or submitting
    a form, verfiy that the correct navigations take place.

elements.name: Verify Page
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify that appropriate page is shown.

steps.name: I click the "Bootstrap Date Picker" link
I should be on the "bootstrap-date-picker" page

elements.name: Verify Page with Trailing Slash
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify that appropriate page is shown.

steps.name: I should be on the "home" page

elements.name: Verify Redirect
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify redirection to the appropriate page.

steps.name: I click the "Bootstrap Date Picker" link
I should be redirected to the "bootstrap-date-picker" page

elements.name: Verify Javascript Alerts
elements.description: Verify that alerts can be verified.

steps.name: I should not see the popup "I am an alert box!"
I click the first instance of "Click me!"
I should see the popup "I am an alert box!"

elements.name: Verify Redirect
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify redirection to the appropriate page.

steps.name: I should be redirected to the "basicform" page

elements.name: Verify Redirect
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify redirection to the appropriate page.

steps.name: I should be redirected to the "basic-checkbox" page

elements.name: Verify Redirect
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify redirection to the appropriate page.

steps.name: I should be redirected to the "radio-button" page

elements.name: Verify Redirect
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify redirection to the appropriate page.

steps.name: I should be redirected to the "table-search" page

elements.name: Verify Redirect
elements.description: After clicking on a link, verify redirection to the appropriate page.

steps.name: I should be redirected to the "table-sort" page

name: Test General Interaction Steps
description:
Verify that Kosher's general interaction steps
    work as expected.

elements.name: Indexing Matches
elements.description: Verify first element.

steps.name: I press the first instance of "ColumnHeader"

elements.name: Indexing Matches Part 2
elements.description: Verify last element.

steps.name: I click the last instance of "ColumnHeader"

elements.name: Accepting JavaScript Alerts
elements.description: Verify that alerts can be accepted.

steps.name: I click the first instance of "Click me!"
I should not see the popup "I am an alert box!"

elements.name: Declining JavaScript Alerts
elements.description: Verify that alerts can be declined.

steps.name: I click the first instance of "Click me!"
I should not see the popup "I am an alert box!"

elements.name: Fill in JavaScript Prompt
elements.description: Verfiy that text can be entered in a JavaScript prompt.

steps.name: I click the "Click for Prompt Box" button
I enter "Some User" in the popup
I should see "You have entered 'Some User' !"

name: Verify Miscellaneous Elements of the Page
description:
Verify that Kosher's steps for verifying
    various elements on the page work properly.

elements.name: Confirm I see all the Texts
elements.description:
Verify that I see various labels and
        excerpts of text on the page.

steps.name: I should see all of the texts:

elements.name: Confirm Flags Work
elements.description: Verify that selector flags work.

steps.name: I should see the "@{INVISIBLE}Bootstrap Date Picker" link
I should not see the "Bootstrap Date Picker" link
the "HomeCenterMessage" element should contain "We have listed most of the components that are used by developers to build web applications."
the "HomeCenterMessage" element should not contain "Hello, World."

elements.name: Confirm Buttons/Links are Visible on the Page
elements.description:
Verify that I see a button and/or link on the page
        and that I do not see a button and/or link on the page.

steps.name: I should see the "Bootstrap Date Picker" link
I should see a link that points to "./bootstrap-date-picker-demo.html"
I should not see the "Table Pagination" link
I should not see a link that points to "./table-pagination-demo.html"

elements.name: Confirm Table of Data is Visible on the Page
elements.description: Verify that a table of data is on the page.

elements.name: Confirm INPUTs with NAME
elements.description: Verify that I see an INPUT with a specific NAME.

steps.name: I should see an "input" with "name" of "first_name"
I should not see an "input" with "name" of "middle_name"

elements.name: Confirm DIVs with ID
elements.description: Verify that I see a DIV with a specific ID.

steps.name: I should see a "div" with "id" of "user-message"
I should not see a "div" with "id" of "user-message2"

name: Test Radio Button and Checkbox Manipulation
description:
Verify that Kosher's steps for manipulating
    and verifying radio buttons and checkboxes
    work correctly.

steps.name: I should see "Radio button 'Female' is checked"
the "Male" radio should not be selected
I check "Click on this check box"
I should see "Success - Check box is checked"

elements.name: Check Multiple Checkboxes and I Uncheck a Checkbox

steps.name: I should not see the "Uncheck All" button
I should see the "Check All" button
I should see the "Uncheck All" button
I should see the "Check All" button
the "Option 4" checkbox should not be checked

name: Test Select Menu Manipulation
description:
Verify that Kosher's steps for manipulating
    and verifying select menus works correctly.

elements.name: Selecting a Single Option from a Dropdown
Selecting a Single Option from a Select List

steps.name: I should see "First selected option is : New York"

elements.name: Select Multiple Options from a Select List

steps.name: I select the following values from "multi-select":
"multi-select" should have the following options selected:

elements.name: Deselect Options from a Select List

steps.name: I select the following values from "multi-select":
I unselect the following values from "multi-select":
"multi-select" should have the following options selected:

name: Test Macros
description:
Verify that Kosher's macros feature
    works correctly.

elements.name: Fill a Textbox
elements.description: Verify steps for fill a textbox.

steps.name: I fill the rest of the input form

name: Test Textbox Manipulation and Validation
description:
Verify that Kosher's steps for manipulating
    and verifying textboxes work correctly.

elements.name: Fill a Textbox
elements.description: Verify steps for fill a textbox.

elements.name: Fill in Textarea
elements.description: Verify that filling a textarea with multiline text works.

elements.name: Fill Multiple Textboxes
elements.description: Verify steps for filling multiple textboxes.

elements.name: Keying Characters
elements.description: Verify that keying characters works.

steps.name: I should see "United States of America"
